did.unittitle: Central Virginia Gay and Lesbian Publications Collection, ca. 1990-2005

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box/Folder, Central Virginia Gay and Lesbian Publications Collection, Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Publications principally were gifts of Steve Murden, Richmond, Virginia. He donated the items periodically over the course of several years in the 1990's and 2000's.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection principally contains publications related to and concerning the gay and lesbian community in Central Virginia. Consists of organization newsletters, advertisement broadsides and flyers, newspapers, and magazines. Principally contains publications produced by specific organizations (i. e. newsletters and advertisements) and nationally and locally published magazines and newspapers that concern gay and lesbian issues but that are not associated with any one organization (i. e. The Advocate and the Virginia GayZette).

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in one series: I. Organizations, which contains subseries A-H.
Alphabetical with folder contents arranged chronologically.
